data.title: Jack Nicholson gets heartbreaking news as Hollywood icon dies
data.meta_description: The legendary actor worked with him for more than 60 years.
data.text:
Legendary actor Jack Nicholson got some heartbreaking news Thursday as his longtime agent, Sandy Bresler, died.

Bresler, 87, reportedly died after a short illness.

The Hollywood Reporter said that the actor and agent first met in the 1960s while serving in the California Air National Guard. The site said Bresler, the son of a Hollywood producer himself, began working as Nicholson’s agent in 1961.

Rock band frontman’s death at 61 leaves fans heartbroken

24 country music artists, influencers have died in 2024. Here is who we lost

Country music legend’s wife fears for safety if fans learn value of his estate

These country music stars are saying farewell this year

Rock, pop legend admits his ‘days are numbered’ as birthday approaches

He became an icon among agents with a personal client list that eventually grew to include Judd Hirsch, Randy Quaid and Louise Linton. He served as Nicholson’s agent for more than 60 years.

Bresler had a sextuple heart bypass surgery in 2003, the Hollywood Reporter said.

WWE Hall of Famer has been hospitalized in Georgia

New details emerge after death of Clint Eastwood’s longtime girlfriend

Rock star who told fans he wished shooter didn’t miss Trump gets more bad news

Ex-WWE, UFC star Ronda Rousey makes major life announcement

Ex-Philadelphia Eagles running back gets WWE tryout

The site said he was survived by his wife of 58 years, Nancy, a son, Eric, a daughter, Jennifer, and twin grandsons, Brandon and Jonah.

It said his funeral is set for Aug. 6 at hillside Memorial Park in Los Angeles.
